In This Section
This section contains the topic “
Evaluating Evidence and Deciding a Claim for PTSD Related to Personal Trauma
.”
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section E - Evidence Evaluation and Decisions for Posttraumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) Claims Related to Personal Trauma
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section E
